title: Heretics and the Inquisition  (2014 - Complete Series)
description:
TV : Documentary : VHS Quality : English


From the Yesterday Channel we here have a 2014 series which looks at the Inquisition which was set up to eradicate heresy and continued until the early 19th century when Napoleon finally crushed it forever.

Series 1 | Episode 1
A shocking four-part series exploring the bloody, menacing work carried out by The Inquisition. A look at the brutal persecution of the Knights Templars and Cathars.

Series 1 | Episode 2
Not just a Monty Python sketch, but an infamous and vicious religious persecution. Experts reveal the barbaric torture faced by Muslim and Jewish converts to Catholicism.

Series 1 | Episode 3
A history of heresy. The founding of the Church of England by Henry VIII and the rule of Catholic monarch Mary I caused years of turmoil as the two faiths clashed.

Series 1 | Episode 4
Shocking persecutions from history. In the 1600s, witch-hunters used heinous tactics to unearth heretics practising witchcraft, including the infamous swimming test.


Enjoy and Seed!!
